content:
Hello, World! üëã Welcome to the FinanceCraftedSheets blog! We’re excited to launch this space where we’ll share:
Budgeting tips that actually work Template tutorials to get the most out of our spreadsheets Financial strategies for paying off debt and building savings Free resources and downloadable tools Stay Tuned We’ll be posting regularly with actionable advice to help you take control of your finances. Whether you’re just starting your budget journey or optimizing an existing system, there’s something here for you.

summary: Introducing our blog ‚Äî your go-to resource for budgeting tips, financial templates, and money management strategies.
title: Welcome to FinanceCraftedSheets Blog

content:
About FinanceCraftedSheets Our Story FinanceCraftedSheets was founded on a simple belief: managing money should be simple, clear, and empowering. We believe that with the right tools and knowledge, anyone can take control of their finances ‚Äî regardless of their background or current financial situation.
We spent years watching people struggle with confusing spreadsheets, overwhelming budgeting apps, and conflicting financial advice. So we decided to create something different: beautifully designed, easy-to-use budget templates and financial spreadsheets that actually make sense.
What We Offer We create practical financial tools and resources available on Etsy, including:
Budget Templates ‚Äî Monthly, weekly, and annual budgets for Google Sheets and Excel Debt Payoff Trackers ‚Äî Snowball and avalanche method calculators Savings Goal Planners ‚Äî Track your progress toward financial freedom Expense Trackers ‚Äî Categorize and visualize your spending Net Worth Dashboards ‚Äî Monitor your financial progress over time Educational Content ‚Äî Articles, guides, and tips on personal finance Why Our Templates? Every template is crafted with three principles in mind:
Clean Design ‚Äî Beautiful, distraction-free layouts that make tracking your money enjoyable Clear Instructions ‚Äî Step-by-step guidance so you know exactly how to use each tool Automatic Calculations ‚Äî No complicated formulas to figure out ‚Äî just plug in your numbers and go Our Mission FinanceCraftedSheets exists to empower people with practical financial tools and education. We believe that financial literacy and smart money management are within reach for everyone, and our goal is to make the journey easier, clearer, and more rewarding.
On This Blog This blog is where we share:
Budgeting strategies and best practices Financial tips and money-saving ideas Guides to using our templates effectively Practical insights on managing debt, savings, and wealth-building Educational content for all financial backgrounds All content is designed to be informational and educational ‚Äî not a substitute for professional financial advice. See our Financial Disclaimer for details.
Shop Our Templates Ready to take control of your finances? Browse our complete collection of budget templates, trackers, and planners:
üëâ Visit FinanceCraftedSheets on Etsy
Thank you for being part of the FinanceCraftedSheets community. Whether you’re just starting your financial journey or optimizing your existing strategy, we’re here to help.
title: About

title: Contact

content:
Financial Disclaimer IMPORTANT ‚Äî PLEASE READ CAREFULLY
Informational and Educational Purposes Only The content provided on the FinanceCraftedSheets website and blog, including but not limited to articles, templates, guides, calculators, and commentary, is presented for informational and educational purposes only. Nothing on this website should be construed as professional financial advice, investment advice, tax advice, or any other form of professional financial guidance.
Not Professional Financial Advice FinanceCraftedSheets does not provide professional financial advice. The information presented on this website is general in nature and does not take into account your individual financial situation, goals, objectives, or needs. What may be appropriate for one person may not be suitable for another.
Consult a Licensed Professional Before making any financial decisions, including but not limited to:
Creating or following a budget Investing your money Saving for retirement Managing debt Tax planning Insurance decisions You should consult with a licensed financial advisor, tax professional, attorney, or other qualified financial professional who can evaluate your specific circumstances and provide personalized advice.
No Warranties or Guarantees The content on this website is provided on an “as-is” basis without any warranties or guarantees of any kind, express or implied, including:
Warranty of accuracy or completeness Warranty of fitness for a particular purpose Warranty that the information is up-to-date or current Warranty that the information is free from errors or omissions Warranty that using the information will produce any specific financial results Financial markets change rapidly, and information that was accurate at one time may become outdated. We do not guarantee that any information or strategies mentioned will work for your situation.
Limitation of Liability To the fullest extent permitted by law, FinanceCraftedSheets, its owners, employees, and representatives shall not be liable for:
Any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages Loss of profit, revenue, or data Damages arising from your use of or reliance on information on this website Damages arising from your financial decisions or investment outcomes Any other damages or losses arising out of or related to this website This limitation applies even if FinanceCraftedSheets has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
Templates and Calculators While our budget templates, debt payoff calculators, savings trackers, and other tools are designed with care and accuracy, they are provided for educational use only. Always verify calculations and consult a professional before making financial decisions based on these tools.
Past Performance Any references to historical investment performance or past financial results do not guarantee future results. Financial markets are unpredictable, and your results may vary based on numerous factors beyond our control.
Individual Responsibility You are solely responsible for:
Your financial decisions Your use of the information on this website Verifying information before relying on it Consulting appropriate professionals for your specific situation Complying with all applicable laws and regulations Risk Acknowledgment All financial decisions involve risk. You acknowledge and accept the risks associated with any financial decisions you make based on information from this website or any other source.
Changes to Content FinanceCraftedSheets reserves the right to modify, update, or remove any content on this website at any time without notice. We do not warrant that content will be available continuously or without interruption.
Not an Offer to Buy or Sell Securities Nothing on this website constitutes an offer to buy or sell securities, financial instruments, or investment products. Any securities trading must be conducted through appropriate licensed brokers and platforms.
Your Use Constitutes Acceptance By accessing and using FinanceCraftedSheets, you acknowledge that you have read this disclaimer, understand the risks involved, and agree that:
You will not hold FinanceCraftedSheets liable for your financial decisions You understand that the content is educational in nature You will consult appropriate professionals before making financial decisions You accept full responsibility for your financial choices State and Local Laws This disclaimer is intended to comply with applicable federal and state laws. However, some jurisdictions may not allow all limitations on liability. In such cases, the liability of FinanceCraftedSheets shall be limited to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law.
Summary FinanceCraftedSheets provides educational budget templates and financial content. We are NOT a substitute for professional financial, investment, tax, or legal advice. Always consult with qualified professionals before making financial decisions.
If you do not agree with this disclaimer, please do not use this website or any of our templates.
For questions regarding this disclaimer, please contact us at bobvillarreal97@gmail.com.
Last Updated: February 14, 2025
title: Financial Disclaimer

content:
Privacy Policy Last Updated: February 14, 2025
FinanceCraftedSheets (“we,” “us,” “our,” or “Company”) operates the FinanceCraftedSheets website and blog. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our website and the choices you have associated with that data.
Information Collection and Use We collect several types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our service to you.
Types of Data Collected Personal Data:
Email address (if you choose to contact us) Name (if you voluntarily provide it) Usage data and browsing behavior Automatically Collected Information:
Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system) Page views and interaction data Referring/exit pages Timestamps of activities Google Analytics This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. (“Google”). Google Analytics uses cookies to analyze how you use this website. The information generated about your use of the website (including your IP address) will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States.
Google uses this information for the purposes of:
Evaluating your use of the website Compiling reports on website activity for website operators Providing other services relating to website activity and internet usage Google may also transfer this information to third parties where required to do so by law, or where such third parties process the information on Google’s behalf.
You can opt out of Google Analytics tracking by installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on.
Cookies and Similar Technologies This website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to:
Store your preferences Understand how you interact with our content Deliver targeted advertising Measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns Google DoubleClick DART Cookie:
Google, as a third-party vendor, uses the DART cookie to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website and other sites on the internet You may opt out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google Ad and Content Network privacy policy We also respect the “Do Not Track” signals where available Cookie Types Essential Cookies: Required for site functionality Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver targeted ads You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling cookies may affect site functionality.
Google AdSense This website uses Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google AdSense is an advertising program provided by Google Inc. that displays relevant ads on our website.
Google uses cookies and web beacons to collect and process information about your visits to this and other websites This information may be used to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website You can opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google’s Ads Settings Third-Party Service Providers We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our service, provide service on our behalf, or perform service-related services:
Google LLC ‚Äî Analytics and advertising GitHub Pages ‚Äî Website hosting Etsy ‚Äî E-commerce platform for our templates These third parties have access only to the information necessary to perform their functions and are contractually obligated to maintain the confidentiality of such information.
Your Data Rights Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
The right to access your personal data The right to correct inaccurate data The right to request deletion of your data The right to withdraw consent The right to object to processing To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at bobvillarreal97@gmail.com.
Data Retention We retain personal data only for as long as necessary:
Analytical data is retained per Google Analytics default policies Contact form data is retained for 90 days unless you request deletion Cookie data is retained per the expiration set by each cookie Security We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure.
Children’s Privacy Our website is not directed to anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will delete such information immediately.
Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the “Last Updated” date.
Contact Us If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
Email: bobvillarreal97@gmail.com
FinanceCraftedSheets is committed to protecting your privacy and providing transparency about how we collect and use your information.
title: Privacy Policy
